question: You are planning a short visit to a city where one of your relatives lives.Write a letter to your relative. In your letter:• Explain when and how long you will be in town.• Ask whether you can stay at their home.• Offer to pay for yourself.
text: Hope this letter will find you in radiant health. I am writing to inform you that I will be visiting Delhi for a Business Trip from 26-30 June. However, this time there is no accommodation provided by the office, so  Can I stay with you for this duration? If you agree then I will accompany my wife as she can meet her aunt as well. It's been a long time since we haven't met, so I hope it would be a good excuse for a family reunion.

Additionally, I request to bear the cost included as post the marriage we have not got a chance to meet and enjoy some time together. Although, my wife has already made the plans with her aunt to roam around the nearby Markets as she heard a lot about and has not had a chance to explore.
I will look forward to hearing from You.
